channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Jane Rigby (astrophysicist)
item.description: Jane Rebecca Rigby is an American astrophysicist who works at the Goddard Space Flight Center and is Senior Project Scientist of the James Webb Space Telescope. She was selected one of Nature's 10 Ones to Watch in 2021 and Shape 2022. In 2024 she was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by President Joe Biden.
